clues.text: In Concord, Massachusetts, you can tour the home where she wrote & set "Little Women"
Author of more than 200 works, Nora Roberts was the first inductee of the Hall of Fame for writers in this genre

"The Hundred Secret Senses" is one of her novels exploring Asian-American family relationships

PACs must register with the FEC, short for this
Unveiled in 2014, the Freedom Partners Action Fund isn't a regular PAC but this kind that can give without limits

This architect of 2 George W. Bush presidential campaigns created the Conservative Victory Project PAC in 2013
This Handel oratorio begins "Comfort ye, comfort ye, my people, saith your God"
This Verdi opera was inspired by a plot from French Egyptologist August Mariette

Brahms' "Wiegenlied: Guten Abend, Gute Nacht" is better known by this name

One of the most visited lakes in Canada, it's called "The gem of the Canadian Rockies"

Completes Mae West's line, "When I'm good, I'm very very good, but..."

Franklin Roosevelt's plan for promoting harmony between the U.S. & Latin America

In this 1955 novel, Humbert Humbert marries widow Charlotte Haze just to be near her Nymphet daughter

Name of James Fenimore Cooper character introduced in "The Pioneers"; he appeared in 4 additional books

The 6th floor of the Texas School Book Depository in Dallas houses a museum devoted to his assassination

Reapers & other types of farm machinery are seen at his memorial museum in Steeles Tavern, Virginia

clues.text: This Washington, D.C. school is the only liberal arts college for the deaf in the U.S.

rounds.text: From the name of the world capital it serves, DEL is the 3-letter code for the Asian airport named for her
